SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, group_account_user_name, group_account_password, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, oc_template_group_id FROM elp_oc_template_group WHERE oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_CODE: SELECT code, description, group_account_user_name, group_account_password, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, oc_template_group_id FROM elp_oc_template_group WHERE TRIM(UPPER(code)) = TRIM(UPPER(:code))
SQL.GET_ASSOCIATED_TEMPLATE_COUNT: select count(oc_template_id) number_of_templates from elp_oc_template where oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_oc_template_group SET code = :code, description = :description, group_account_user_name = :group_account_user_name, group_account_password = :group_account_password, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_oc_template_group ( code, description, group_account_user_name, group_account_password, created_by, oc_template_group_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :group_account_user_name, :group_account_password, :created_by, :oc_template_group_id )
